ValidationRule.description: Must fill out Customer Needs, Shopping Triggers, and How did the customer learn about us? after Opportunity status is changed to 50% probability or higher
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,'Sales Enablement')), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,'Sales Admin')), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'MMS Sales ZSA - SB')), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,'MMS Sales DSA - SB')), ISCHANGED(StageName),
Probability >= 0.50,
AND(OR(ISBLANK(Pain_Points__c),ISBLANK(Products_Of_Interest__c),ISPICKVAL(What_brought_them_to_Paychex__c,''))), OR( $RecordType.Name = 'Core Opportunity Record Type', $RecordType.Name = 'Core Virtual Sales', $RecordType.Name = 'MMS Opportunity Record Type' ), AND(OR( ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c, 'Payroll'), ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c , 'Payroll-ASO')) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Must fill out Customer Needs, Shopping Triggers, and How did the customer learn about us? when probability is 50% or above
